name: Database Variable Field File
summary: Learn about .DBV files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Various xBase-compatible programs support DBV files, including dBase and multisoft FlagShip. You will likely encounter DBV files in the same location next to the DBF files that bear the same name. For example, a database.dbf file may reference the database.dbv file.

instructions: You should not attempt to open DBV files. Instead, the program (e.g., dBASE or multisoft FlagShip) opening the DBF database automatically loads the information in the DBV file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
